headline: Lowe’s Taps Affirm To Expand Financing And Support Digital Growth
summary: Lowe's Companies (NYSE:LOW) has launched a new partnership with Affirm to offer "buy now, pay later" financing for home improvement purchases. The new payment options are available for customers shopping online and through Lowe's mobile app, with plans such as 0% APR and clear upfront terms. Lowe's will also feature on Affirm's marketplace, giving the retailer additional exposure to shoppers who use Affirm to find merchants. Lowe's Companies, trading at $281.16, is adding this new financing...
